listData.name: Bonus Saver account
listData.description: An online savings account that earns you bonus interest when you make at least one deposit of $50 each month, maintain a credit balance and make no withdrawals.

features.additionalInfo: Note: Bonus interest will not be earnt if bonus conditions are not met

constraints.additionalInfo: Interest is only payable on balances up to and including $3 million

fees.name: DORMANCY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on all savings and transaction accounts. Charged in November each year.

detailData.name: Bonus Saver account
detailData.description: An online savings account that earns you bonus interest when you make at least one deposit of $50 each month, maintain a credit balance and make no withdrawals.

listData.name: Easy Savings account
listData.description: An online savings account that earns you interest every month on balances, regardless of how you save. With no minimum balance and no minimum monthly contribution, enjoy ongoing flexibility and value.

features.additionalValue: Ability to set-up alerts via email or SMS from a list of alert options

fees.name: DORMANCY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on all savings and transaction accounts. Charged in November each year.

detailData.name: Easy Savings account
detailData.description: An online savings account that earns you interest every month on balances, regardless of how you save. With no minimum balance and no minimum monthly contribution, enjoy ongoing flexibility and value.

listData.name: Easy Low Rate Credit Card
listData.description: A low rate credit card you can use to shop, manage expenses or use overseas. Comes with the same low rate on cash advances and up to 55 days interest free on purchases.

features.additionalValue: Apply Pay, Google Pay and Samsung Pay

features.additionalInfo: Up to 55 days interest free on purchases when you pay your balance in full by the due date each month

eligibility.additionalValue: Australian citizen or permanent residency only

fees.name: CREDIT_CARD_ANNUAL_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable upon funding initially and is debited from the credit card account each anniversary

fees.name: INTERNATIONAL_CONVERSION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you use your VISA card for a foreign currency transaction or for an Australian dollar transaction that is with a foreign merchant or that is processed by an entity outside Australia. The fee is converted to Australian dollars using the exchange rate valid on the day the emergency card is produced.

fees.name: DOMESTIC_CASH_ADVANCE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on the day of the transaction.

fees.name: OVERSEAS_CASH_ADVANCE_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Fee charged on the day of the transaction

lendingRates.additionalInfo: Credit eligibility criteria, terms and conditions fees and charges apply. Rates are current as at 31/3/2018 and subject to change without notice.
Credit eligibility criteria, terms and conditions fees and charges apply. Rates are current as at 31/3/2018 and subject to change without notice.

detailData.name: Easy Low Rate Credit Card
detailData.description: A low rate credit card you can use to shop, manage expenses or use overseas. Comes with the same low rate on cash advances and up to 55 days interest free on purchases.

listData.name: Easy Everyday Access account
listData.description: An account for everyday with a debit card and no monthly account keeping fees, so you can shop, pay bills, access cash and more. Keep everyday banking low fuss with no minimum monthly deposit needed.

features.additionalValue: Apple Pay, Google Pay and Samsung Pay
Ability to set-up alerts via email or SMS from a list of alert options

fees.name: INTERNATIONAL_CONVERSION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Payable when you use your VISA card for a foreign currency transaction or for an Australian dollar transaction that is with a foreign merchant or that is processed by an entity outside Australia. The fee is converted to Australian dollars using the exchange rate valid on the day the emergency card is produced.

fees.name: DIRECT_DEBIT_DISHONOUR
fees.additionalInfo: Charged when payment of a direct debit from your account is rejected.

fees.name: DORMANCY_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Charged on all savings and transaction accounts. Charged in November each year.

detailData.name: Easy Everyday Access account
detailData.description: An account for everyday with a debit card and no monthly account keeping fees, so you can shop, pay bills, access cash and more. Keep everyday banking low fuss with no minimum monthly deposit needed.

listData.name: STREET SMART VARIABLE HOME LOAN - OWNER-OCCUPIED  (Interest Only)
listData.description: A variable loan for owner occupiers with flexible features such as a 100% offset account to help pay your loan off sooner. Includes a competitive rate, fee free redraw and no monthly or annual fees.

eligibility.additionalValue: Australian citizen or permanent residency only

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes application, one legal and standard valuation fee free for first application, for one security only.

fees.name: CONSTRUCTION_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes application fee, inspection fees and drawdown fees throughout construction period. Legal fees are paid in addition to this and are at cost.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes loan split requests, additional splits, loan top up on existing loan, substitution of security, loan re-fix fee and loan switches (loan switching to a different loan type)

fees.name: RENTAL_OR_CONTRACT_PERFORMANCE_GUARANTEE
fees.additionalInfo: $250 upfront preparation fee plus $250 p.a. (paid in advance)

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE_(LMI)
fees.additionalInfo: LMI fees and charges available on application

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The comparison rate is based on a secured loan amount of $150,000 over a loan term of 25 years. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.

detailData.name: STREET SMART VARIABLE HOME LOAN - OWNER-OCCUPIED  (Interest Only)

listData.description: A fixed rate for 3 years for investors wanting certainty of repayments for a period. Comes with a 100% offset account, the ability to make extra repayments and no monthly or annual fees.

eligibility.additionalValue: Australian citizen or permanent residency only

fees.name: HOME_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes application, one legal and standard valuation fee free for first application, for one security only.

fees.name: CONSTRUCTION_LOAN_APPLICATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes application fee, inspection fees and drawdown fees throughout construction period. Legal fees are paid in addition to this and are at cost.

fees.name: LOAN_VARIATION_FEE
fees.additionalInfo: Includes loan split requests, additional splits, loan top up on existing loan, substitution of security, loan re-fix fee and loan switches (loan switching to a different loan type)

fees.name: RENTAL_OR_CONTRACT_PERFORMANCE_GUARANTEE
fees.additionalInfo: $250 upfront preparation fee plus $250 p.a. (paid in advance)

fees.name: LENDERS_MORTGAGE_INSURANCE_(LMI)
fees.additionalInfo: LMI fees and charges available on application

lendingRates.additionalInfo: The comparison rate is based on a secured loan amount of $150,000 over a loan term of 25 years. WARNING: This comparison rate is true only for the examples given and may not include all fees and charges. Different terms, fees or other loan amounts might result in a different comparison rate.
